item.title: Missed bulky collection reference 89120 - flytipping, 27th June
item.description:

item.title: Rubbish in Crown passage, 27th June
item.description:
The bin have been put in crown passage without any permission. Before they were kept in their own alley way. This is from the restaurant Pirana and Byron house. It is terrible smell and it effects the passage as itâ€™s already small it create a dirty ambience and its affecting my restaurant. Our customers and refusing to come as they say the passage is too dirty. I need someone to come and report this problem immediately. Thanks

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Crown Passage, Victoria, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Vehicle has so far been here for 6 weeks, 27th June
item.description:
I have called the number every day and no one answers any contact online gets no response a number I found through company house goes through to a woman who as soon as you mention the vehicle she starts saying no no no no no then hangs the phone up they are not residents of this area no one has been to the vehicle for 6 weeks
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Purneys Road, Well Hall, London
Report on FixMyStreet
